title: WePromoteCrypto
author: WePromoteCrypto
content: Hey, guys!I've been working on a project for the last 5 months after a long hiatus.It's a blockchain (EVM chains) advertising network that I'm looking to launch in October or November, depending on how good or bad the volume is.Remembered that I've got a BCT account and wanted to check out the general forum sentiment on ERC20 tokens.As BCT is the #1 Bitcoin forum, I remember that most of bitcoiners were against other coins and altcoins.What are your thoughts on the current alts market?As many of the OGs know/remember, September used to be really bad for crypto, in general.October usually brought insane volume.
